com.xmlmind.ditac.xslt

Class ExtensionFunctions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xmlmind.ditac.xslt.ExtensionFunctions

  • public final class ExtensionFunctions
extends java.lang.Object
    This class allows to register with Saxon 9.7+ all the extension functions needed to run the XSL stylesheets found in ditac_install_dir/xsl/.

    • Method Detail

      • registerAll

        public static void registerAll(javax.xml.transform.TransformerFactory factory)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Registers with Saxon 9.7+ all the extension functions needed to run the XSL stylesheets found in ditac_install_dir/xsl/.

        This method must be invoked once per TransformerFactory.

        Parameters:
        factory - the TransformerFactory pointing to Saxon 9.7+ extension function registry (that is, a net.sf.saxon.Configuration). This object must be an instance of net.sf.saxon.TransformerFactoryImpl.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
